name: data-pipeline
description: Data engineering with extract, transform, and load agents

agents.name: extractor
agents.role: Source connectors, ingestion logic, schema mapping, incremental extraction, change data capture

agents.name: transformer
agents.role: Business logic, data cleaning, aggregation, validation rules, data quality checks

agents.name: loader
agents.role: Sink connectors, idempotent writes, partitioning, monitoring, schema evolution handling
